title: AES Shipment Filing Creation
description: Allows users to create new electronic export shipment declarations (EEI filings) by entering all mandatory and relevant optional data elements required by CBP AES regulations.
functionality: Input USPPI, Ultimate Consignee, and Authorized Agent (Forwarder) details.
Specify transportation details (mode of transport, port of export, departure date etc.).
Add one or more commodity lines with required details (e.g., Schedule B/HTS number, value, quantity, weight, origin).
Support for commodities requiring multiple units of measure.
Handle specific routing scenarios (e.g., US to PR, PR to US).
benefits: Enables users to initiate the export declaration process.
Provides a structured way to capture all necessary shipment data.
Forms the foundation for AES compliance.
